titles.title: Providing for payment of a lump sum for accrued annual leave to eligible former employees of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.
Mr. Thomas asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 01/17/1995--Passed House amended.    (There is 1 other summary). Requires payment of a lump sum for accrued annual leave to an eligible employee of the House of Representatives: (l) who is separated from employment involuntarily; (2) whose last day of employment occurs between December 31, 1994, and June 30, 1995; and (3) who is not reemployed by the House, the Senate, or a legislative branch agency within 30 days.
